name: Warhammer Quest
description: Based on the classic tabletop game, Warhammer Quest is an addictive mix of role-playing and strategy. Lead your group of brave adventurers through the perilous dungeons of the Warhammer World in the search for wealth and glory!
intro: Level up your party of Warhammer heroes! Loot weapons, armour and mysterious artefacts. Crush Orcs, Goblins, Trolls!
